DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety effectiveness enVistaÂ® One-Piece Hydrophobic Acrylic intraocular lens ( IOL ) , follow primary implantation visual correction aphakia adult 18 year age older cataractous lens remove extracapsular cataract extraction method ( eg , small incision phacoemulsification ) .
DOC.brief_title: One-Piece Hydrophobic Acrylic Intraocular Lens Subjects Undergoing Cataract Extraction
DOC.criteria: Subjects must clinically document diagnosis agerelated cataract consider amenable treatment standard phacoemulsification/extracapsular cataract extraction . Subjects must best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) equal bad 20/40 study eye , without glare source . Subjects must BCVA project good 20/30 IOL implantation study eye . Subjects anterior segment pathology extracapsular phacoemulsification cataract surgery would contraindicate . Subjects serious ocular pathology , underlie serious medical condition , base Investigator 's medical judgment , could confound result study .
